summary: GAO's work yielded $70.4 billion in financial benefits for the federal government in FY 2023—a return of $84 for every dollar invested in us. We did it by recommending ways to improve efficiency and effectiveness in federal programs, and more. We also identified 1,220 other benefits—things that improve programs and operations but can't be measured in dollars. For example, our work led to: Actions preventing...
title: Performance and Accountability Report, Fiscal Year 2023
